successes.title: NeuroOn: Personal Sleep Architect
successes.description: NeuroOn is the world’s first system, which allows you to modify your sleep paterns with patented light therapy.

Pledges.description: SPECIAL THANKS: Thanks for helping us take human productivity to the next level and believing in our product! You'll receive a personal, sincere, huge thank you from the NeuroOn team and we will have warm fuzzy feeling for you!
EXCLUSIVE NEWSLETTER: only available via Kickstarter! We'll keep you up to date on all exclusive facts concerning the development of NeuroOn. Fuzzy feeling included.
NEUROON T-SHIRT: let everyone know you support the NeuroOn project and do it with style with the original NeuroOn t-shirt!
SHAPE REMEMBERING PILLOW: a pillow we created from the very same foam as the smart sleep mask! You will become best buddies with the same head shape!

SMART SLEEP MASK- PREORDER:
If you preordered our mask before the campaign you could use this reward, if not you're buying a special thanks without the mask.
SMART SLEEP MASK- LAST MINUTE OFFER: We listen to you. If the price was a problem this should be no more. For people who want the NeuroOn and can wait a little bit longer.
SMART SLEEP MASK- LAST MINUTE OFFER 2: We listen to you. If the price was a problem this should be no more. For people who want the NeuroOn and can wait a little bit longer.
SMART SLEEP MASK- SUPER EARLY BIRD: Early bird, get it? Thank you very much for your trust and congratulations for being so fast! You will be among the first people getting NeuroOn.
SMART SLEEP MASK- EARLY BIRD: You snoozed on the first early bird chance? Not to worry! You can still make the early pledge and get the NeuroOn as one of the first people in the world!
SMART SLEEP MASK: Get your NeuroOn start sleeping sleep less and more efficiently!

SMART SLEEP MASK FOR CHRISTMAS 2013- we will deliver you a special, printed card of NeuroOn before the 24th of December. The card is a VOUCHER for out SMART SLEEP MASK (Estimated delivery- Jul 2014.), so that you can share #sleepbetter love with your beloved ones!
You get SMART SLEEP MASK: delivery- Jul 2014 and NeuroOn printed card: delivery- Dec 2014
2 SMART SLEEP MASKS- PREORDER: If you preordered our masks before the campaign you could use this reward, if not you're buying a special thanks without the masks.

SMART SLEEP MASK, DESIGNED BY YOU: Be the fashion dictator guru of NeuroOn! You will receive our smart sleeping mask with a cover designed especially for you. Send us your project and we will ship your personalized mask to your door!
SMART SLEEP MASK- DEVELOPER VERSION: Get the developer version of the NeuroOn mask and start your own projects with it!
